code: import React,{useContext,useState}from"react";import{CartContext}from"../../context/cart.context";import Button from"../button/button.component";import"./product-cart.style.scss";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductCart=_ref=>{let{product}=_ref;const{name,price,imageUrl}=product;const{addItemToCart}=useContext(CartContext);const[isAdded,setIsAdded]=useState(false);const addItemToCartHandler=()=>{if(!isAdded){addItemToCart(product);setIsAdded(true);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-cart-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:imageUrl,alt:`${name}`}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"footer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"name",children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"price",children:["$",price]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{buttonType:"inverted",onClick:addItemToCartHandler,children:isAdded?"Go to card":"Add to card"})]});};export default ProductCart;
